page.title: 12CLYRO CHURCH.
page.content: {St.Michael and All Angels' Church is situated in the centre of the village.The church remains a peaceful place although it has become well known as the church featured in Kilvert's Diaries. Part of the tower dates back to the Middle Ages.The main part of the church, however, was built in the 1850's.The tower holds the{bells}which are rung on the{first Sunday of every {month}and at special services, weddings etc. Local villagers act as bellringers. A nave is now used by the {Sunday School.}The choir stalls are no longer used. There are services each Sunday at 8.00a.m. and 11.00am.The Sunday School meet every second and third Sunday in the month at{9.30am.The Mothers {Union}is linked with the Church. Their meetings are held in the{Church Hall.
